sections.title: 1. Data Controller
sections.content:
TalentQX processes your personal data as a data controller under the Turkish Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("KVKK").

Data Controller: TalentQX Technology Inc.
Address: [Company Address]
Email: privacy@talentqx.com

sections.title: 2. Personal Data Processed
sections.content:
The following personal data is processed:

• Identity Information: Name, surname
• Contact Information: Email address, phone number
• Company Information: Company name, position, employee count
• Assessment Data: Competency assessment responses, analysis results
• Technical Data: IP address, browser information, access logs

sections.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
sections.content:
Your personal data is processed for:

• Providing and managing our services
• Evaluating demo and contact requests
• Conducting and analyzing competency assessments
• Fulfilling our legal obligations
• Improving service quality and statistical analysis
• Security and fraud prevention activities

sections.title: 4. Data Transfers
sections.content:
Your personal data may be transferred to:

• Public authorities within the scope of legal obligations
• Our service providers (cloud services, analytics tools)
• Our group companies

within the conditions specified in Articles 8 and 9 of KVKK. For international transfers, safeguards required by KVKK are provided.

sections.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
sections.content:
Your personal data is processed based on:

• Your explicit consent (KVKK Art. 5/1)
• Contract performance (KVKK Art. 5/2-c)
• Legal obligations (KVKK Art. 5/2-d)
• Legitimate interests (KVKK Art. 5/2-f)

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.content:
Your personal data is retained for the duration required by the processing purpose and legal retention periods:

• Contact data: 2 years from last communication
• Assessment data: 3 years from assessment date
• Legal obligation data: As required by applicable legislation

sections.title: 7. Your Rights Under KVKK
sections.content:
Under Article 11 of KVKK, you have the right to:

• Learn whether your personal data is processed
• Request information if processed
• Learn the purpose of processing and whether data is used accordingly
• Know third parties to whom data is transferred
• Request rectification if data is incomplete or inaccurate
• Request erasure or destruction
• Request notification of rectification/erasure to third parties
• Object to automated decision-making
• Claim compensation for damages due to unlawful processing

sections.title: 8. How to Exercise Your Rights
sections.content:
To exercise your rights:

Email: privacy@talentqx.com

Please include identity verification information in your written request. Your request will be evaluated and concluded within 30 days.

sections.title: 9. Changes
sections.content: This notice may be updated due to legal changes or service modifications. The current version will always be published on our website.
